content.content: hello.I sent Dai 2 days ago, but the assets have not been credited so far.The addresses are exactly correct (I sent  between these addresses many times) 0x00f9f4e335bbf228cda75f5ae09a66a91051b5d78ed579392e3a37b8859d5be2

This is your transaction.  You are offering 13 Gwei to miners to process your transaction   Other Ethereum users are offering more Gwei to process their transactions So they are being processed before yours  image1356×400 49.1 KB  Here you can check gas prices (and historical values). And there are a lot more.  Possible Solutions  Wait until all the higher bidding transactions get processed (this might not happen anytime soon). Replace the transaction.

Thank you very much!)But I do not know how to do it exactly.I sent Dai from Trezor Suite and i cant up comission(dosnt work in trazor suit).And if i will not up comission, so transaction can be uncomfirmed for ever?

The gwei has to be lowered to 13 to be confirmed. Note that if Trezord gives you the private key, you can easily export it and paste it into your metamask and replace the commission by paying a little more.
Thank you very much for answer.When I connect to MetaMask with Trezor, I see only empty adresses,I cant understatnd why metamask dont see my adress with balance(where i need to change comission).

The prudent thing to do then is to contact trezord support.    trezor.io    Trezor Hardware Wallet | The original & most secure bitcoin wallet. Discover the secure vault for your digital assets. Store bitcoins, litecoins, passwords, logins, and keys without worries.  Price: USD 55
Yes.You are right.Im going to try.Thanks
